    P

    Penalty1Lv2 - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv2
    Represents the penalty state at Combat Zone Level 2 where the player with the lowest firepower is penalized by moving backward on the route.
    Penalty1Lv2(AdventurePhase, Player) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv2.Penalty1Lv2
    Constructs the Penalty1Lv2 state, applies the movement penalty to the given player, and immediately transitions the state machine to Check2Lv2.
    Penalty2Lv1 - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv1
    Represents the state in the Adventure Phase at Combat Zone Level 1, where the player with the lowest engine power must apply a penalty by removing crew members from their ship.
    Penalty2Lv1(AdventurePhase, Player) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv1.Penalty2Lv1
    Constructs a Penalty2Lv1 state with the given context and the losing player.
    Penalty2Lv2 - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv2
    Represents the penalty state at Combat Zone Level 2 where the player with the lowest engine power must discard a set of materials from their ship.
    Penalty2Lv2(AdventurePhase, Player) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv2.Penalty2Lv2
    Constructs the Penalty2Lv2 state, applies the material loss penalty to the given player, and immediately transitions to the Check3Lv2 state.
    Penalty3Lv1 - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv1
    Represents the state in the Adventure Phase at Combat Zone Level 1, where a defeated player must handle a sequence of hits, one at a time.
    Penalty3Lv1(AdventurePhase, Player, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv1.Penalty3Lv1
    Constructs a Penalty3Lv1 state for handling the defeated player's hits.
    Penalty3Lv2 - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv2
    Represents the third penalty state at Combat Zone Level 2, where a player must handle one or more hits after being identified as the weakest based on crew count.
    Penalty3Lv2(AdventurePhase, Player, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CombatZoneStates.Lv2.Penalty3Lv2
    Constructs the Penalty3Lv2 state and checks if any hits are left to process.
